pages.text: Australian Shepherds were originally bred, and still are used, as herding dogs, particularly with sheep.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these steady dogs come in four different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in warm plains, and meadow, biomes. They can also be found in various windswept biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
